```{r}
library(Rtsne)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(superheat)
source('~/git/scripts/theme_Publication.R')
# https://github.com/stephaniehicks/qsmooth
load('~/git/unified_gene_expression/data/lengthScaledTPM_all_2017.Rdata')
load('~/git/unified_gene_expression/data/lengthScaledTPM_processed_01_27_2017.Rdata')
source('~/git/unified_gene_expression/scripts/parse_sample_attribute.R')
source('~/git/scripts/theme_Publication.R')
```

Plot eye-only clustering
```{r, fig.width=3, fig.height=3}
set.seed(23235)
eye_samples <- core_tight %>% 
  filter(sample_accession %in% colnames(lengthScaledTPM_qsmooth_highExp_remove_lowGenes)) %>% 
  filter(!Tissue %in% 'ENCODE Cell Line') %>% 
  filter(study_accession!='SRP012682') %>% 
  filter(!sample_accession %in% c('SRS523795','SRS360124','SRS360123')) %>% 
  .[['sample_accession']]

eye_TPM <- lengthScaledTPM_qsmooth_highExp_remove_lowGenes[,eye_samples]
perp=20
tsne_out <- Rtsne(as.matrix(log2(t(eye_TPM)+1)),perplexity = perp, check_duplicates = FALSE, theta=0.0)
tsne_plot <- data.frame(tsne_out$Y)
tsne_plot$sample_accession <- colnames(eye_TPM)


# dbscan

dbscan_cluster <- dbscan(tsne_plot %>% select(X1,X2), eps=1, minPts = 3)
tsne_plot$Clusters <- dbscan_cluster$cluster


tsne_plot %>% left_join(.,core_tight)  %>% 
  mutate(Origin=factor(Origin, levels=c('Fetal Tissue', 'Adult Tissue', 'Cell Line'))) %>% 
  ggplot(.,aes(x=X1,y=X2)) + 
  scale_shape_manual(values=c(0:20,35:50)) +
  ggtitle(paste0('Eye tissue t-sne')) +
  geom_point(size=15, alpha=0.2, aes(x=X1, y=X2, colour=as.factor(Clusters))) +
  geom_text(size=4, alpha=0.6, aes(label=Tissue)) + 
  theme_Publication() + guides(colour=guide_legend(nrow=2), shape=guide_legend(nrow=2)) 
 # geom_density2d(alpha=0.3)

tsne_plot %>% left_join(., core_tight) %>% 
  group_by(Clusters, Tissue) %>% summarise(Count=n(), `Origin` = paste(unique(Origin),collapse=', '))

```

Plot pan-human tissue expression
```{r, fig.width=3, fig.height=3.5}
set.seed(23235)
eye_and_gtex_samples <- core_tight %>% 
  filter(sample_accession %in% colnames(lengthScaledTPM_qsmooth_highExp_remove_lowGenes)) %>% 
  filter(!Tissue %in% 'ENCODE Cell Line') %>% 
  filter(!sample_accession %in% c('SRS523795','SRS360124','SRS360123')) %>% 
  .[['sample_accession']]

eye_and_gtex_TPM <- lengthScaledTPM_qsmooth_highExp_remove_lowGenes[,eye_and_gtex_samples]
perp=35
tsne_out <- Rtsne(as.matrix(log2(t(eye_and_gtex_TPM)+1)),perplexity = perp, check_duplicates = FALSE, theta=0.0)
tsne_plot <- data.frame(tsne_out$Y)
tsne_plot$sample_accession <- colnames(eye_and_gtex_TPM)


tsne_plot %>% left_join(.,core_tight)  %>% 
  mutate(Study = study_accession) %>% 
  mutate(Tissue = ifelse(grepl('fibroblasts',Sub_Tissue),' Fibroblasts',Tissue)) %>% 
  ggplot(.,aes(x=X1,y=X2,colour=Tissue,shape=Tissue,alpha=0.6)) + 
  geom_point(size=4, alpha=0.6) + scale_shape_manual(values=c(0:20,35:50)) +
  ggtitle(paste0('Pan-human tissue t-sne')) +
  theme_Publication() + guides(colour=guide_legend(nrow=6), shape=guide_legend(nrow=8))
```

Heatmap of t-sne distances for pan-tissue. Aggregated across 25 to 50 perplexities and at the tissue level
```{r, fig.width=5, fig.height=6}

load('~/git/unified_gene_expression/data/tsne_plotting_5_50_perplexity_2017-02.Rdata')
mean_coord <- long_tsne_plot %>% 
  filter(perplexity >= 25) %>% 
  group_by(sample_accession) %>% summarise(X1=mean(X1),X2=mean(X2)) %>% # group by sample and summarize across all perplexities
  left_join(.,core_tight) %>% 
  mutate(Tissue = ifelse(grepl('fibroblasts',Sub_Tissue),'Fibroblasts',Tissue)) %>% 
  group_by(Tissue) %>% summarise(X1_mean=mean(X1),X2_mean=mean(X2),varX1=var(X1),varX2=var(X2),variance=varX1+varX2) %>%  # then group by tissue and summarise across all samples in a tissue
  data.frame()


distances <- as.matrix(dist(mean_coord[,2:3])) %>% data.frame() 
colnames(distances) <- mean_coord[,1]                     
row.names(distances) <- mean_coord[,1]
superheat(distances, 
          #yr = mean_coord$variance,
          heat.pal = c("#386cb0","#7fc97f","white"), # taken from theme_Publication.R
          col.dendrogram = T,
          pretty.order.rows = T, 
          pretty.order.cols = T,
          bottom.label.text.angle = 90,
          bottom.label.text.size = 5, 
          left.label.text.size = 5,
          dist.method = 'euclidean',
          grid.hline.col = "white",
          grid.vline.col = "white")
```

DBSCAN clustering
```{r, fig.width=4, fig.height=4.5}
library(dbscan)


tsne_35 <- long_tsne_plot %>% filter(perplexity == '35')
dbscan_cluster <- dbscan(long_tsne_plot %>% filter(perplexity=='35') %>% select(X1,X2), eps=2, minPts = 6)
tsne_35$Clusters <- dbscan_cluster$cluster

colourCount = length(unique(tsne_35$Clusters))
getPalette = colorRampPalette(brewer.pal(9, "Set3"))

tsne_35 %>% left_join(., core_tight) %>% 
  mutate(Study = study_accession) %>% 
  mutate(Tissue = ifelse(grepl('fibroblasts',Sub_Tissue),' Fibroblasts',Tissue)) %>% 
  ggplot() + 
  ggtitle(paste0('Pan-human tissue t-sne, DBSCAN Clustering')) +
  geom_point(size=15, alpha=0.2, aes(x=X1, y=X2, colour=as.factor(Clusters))) + 
  geom_point(aes(x=X1,y=X2,shape=Tissue),size=4, alpha=0.4) +
  scale_shape_manual(values=c(0:20,35:50)) +
  scale_colour_manual(values = getPalette(colourCount)) +
  theme_Publication() + guides(colour=guide_legend(nrow=6), shape=guide_legend(nrow=6))

tsne_35 %>% left_join(., core_tight) %>% 
  group_by(Clusters, Tissue) %>% summarise(Count=n(), `Sub Tissue` = paste(unique(Sub_Tissue),collapse=','))
```
